adDetails: ►►►WHOLE HOUSE CARPET CLEANING SPECIAL $99 NO HIDDEN FEES! Want the very best technology in carpet cleaning?? Then don't settle for wand cleaning move on up to the ROTOVAC!!! A manual wand (right) requires backbreaking effort to push the wand over the carpet. It only cleans from two directions (back & forth), producing mediocre cleaning results and leaving many tough stains in the carpet. The Rotovac (left) cleans your carpets from all directions with 1500 mechanized cleaning passes per minute. With the Rotovac's intensive, aggressive cleaning action, your carpets will look, feel and stay cleaner longer!
